title: Elect-Tracey

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Electrify someone's tools, learning their role. You may improve upon the rolecard however you want as long as the Host accepts.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -Your target gains their new rolecard at the start of the following day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Affect the game in some way. Host decides if you win

desc:
Post 2408
*Just boring old guts I'm afraid. Oh wait, there are some wires. So why don't we just call this one a maybe.*
